name: Cat Game (Tanicorn)
description:
CAT GAME

This game was made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2021 Online. From 29/01/2021 5PM and we stopped development at 31/01/2020 5PM.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Team:

Team Cat

Members:

Me - Tanicorn(Designer/Programmer/Artist)

Calum Sarjeant - Green Lizard(Designer/Programmer/Artist/Sound)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

    Controls:

    WASD: Movement

    R: Quick Restart

    Spacebar: Drop Item

    Esc: Menu

Try and finish the levels in as little moves as possible.

All assets were made by the team.

Note: The game will be developed further to fix the impossible level 8, 9. And fix the counter.

I'll also add a trailer video.
